title: Patterns in Action - not working
ques:
Hello,

I just bought your design pattern framework 4.0. When I try to  run the Patterns in Action project, I get the below error.

{'The database 'C:\DOFACTORY PATTERNS 4.0 CS\PATTERNS IN ACTION\HOST.WCF.ACTIONSERVER\APP_DATA\ACTION.MDF' cannot be opened because it is version 655. This server supports version 612 and earlier. A downgrade path is not supported.rnCould not open new database 'C:\DOFACTORY PATTERNS 4.0 CS\PATTERNS IN ACTION\HOST.WCF.ACTIONSERVER\APP_DATA\ACTION.MDF'. CREATE DATABASE is aborted.rnAn attempt to attach an auto-named database for file C:\DoFactory Patterns 4.0 CS\Patterns In Action\Host.WCF.ActionServer\App_Data\Action.mdf failed. A database with the same name exists, or specified file cannot be opened, or it is located on UNC share.'}

I appreciate your help.

Thanks,
Kumar

answers.ans: It's saying that the version of SQL Server you are running is an older version. I believe 655 is SQL Server 2008, so running SQL Server 2008 Express edition should take care of it.
